title: Input schema of the Venture Capital Portfolio Tracker scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed URLs to start crawling from (VC portfolio pages, firm homepages, directories).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL (helps stay within firm domains).
